meanings.definition: A weight class in boxing and other combat sports for athletes weighing over a certain limit.
meanings.sent1: The superheavyweight boxer dominated his opponent in the ring.
meanings.sent2: The superheavyweight division includes fighters with impressive strength.
meanings.sent3: The superheavyweight fighter accidentally stepped on the scale twice!
meanings.sent4: His backpack felt like a superheavyweight burden on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The superheavyweight title match was the highlight of the boxing event.

meanings.definition: A very heavy or large object or person.
meanings.sent1: The movers struggled to lift the superheavyweight couch.
meanings.sent2: The superheavyweight of the team easily pushed the boulder aside.
meanings.sent3: Carrying the superheavyweight suitcase made her arms ache.
meanings.sent4: The superheavyweight of responsibilities weighed heavily on his mind.
meanings.sent5: The superheavyweight elephant gracefully moved through the jungle.
